/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, Table, FormGroup, Input, Modal, Label, Form, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, } from "reactstrap"; class Vault extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleChangeETH = this.handleChangeETH.bind(this); this.handleChangeAmountTokenUSD = this.handleChangeAmountTokenUSD.bind(this); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", miniModal: false, formModal: false, dataMiniModal: [], CPamountETH: 0, CPamountTokenUSD: 0, closedCPs: false, } } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; toggleModal = (modalState, id, tokens, ETH) => { this.setState({ [modalState]: !this.state[modalState], dataMiniModal: [id, tokens, ETH] }); }; handleChangeETH(e) { this.setState({CPamountETH: (e.target.value * 10**18).toLocaleString( 'fullwide', { useGrouping: false })}); } handleChangeAmountTokenUSD(e) { this.setState({CPamountTokenUSD: (e.target.value * 10**20).toLocaleString( 'fullwide', { useGrouping: false })}); } createCP = receiver => { const web3 = this.props.web3; const instanceColl = this.props.instanceColl; if (this.props.web3Available !== "false") { web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => instanceColl.methods.openCP(this.state.CPamountTokenUSD).send( {from: result, value: this.state.CPamountETH}))}; }; closeCP = receiver => { const web3 = this.props.web3; const instanceColl = this.props.instanceColl; if (this.props.web3Available !== "false") { web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => instanceColl.methods.closeCP(receiver).send( {from: result}))}; }; filterCP = () => { this.setState({ closedCPs: !this.state.closedCPs}); } renderTableData() { if(this.props.indexCP > 0){ var index = this.props.indexCP; var CP = []; var rows = []; if (this.props.individualCPs.length > 0) { for(var i = 0; i < index; i++) { CP[i+1] = this.props.individualCPs[i]; if(this.state.closedCPs === true) { rows[i] = ( {i+1} {CP[i+1][2] === true ? ("closed"):("open")} {(CP[i+1][1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD burn | mint {(CP[i+1][0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH deposit | withdraw {isNaN((CP[i+1][1]/10**20)/(CP[i+1][0]/10**18)) ? (
0,00 USD
):(
{((CP[i+1][1]/10**20)/(CP[i+1][0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
)} {CP[i+1][2] === true ? ():(0,00)} {CP[i+1][2] === true ? ():(claim)} {CP[i+1][2] === true ? ():( | {(CP[i+1][0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH | {isNaN((CP[i+1][1]/10**20)/(CP[i+1][0]/10**18)) ? (
0,00 USD
):(
{((CP[i+1][1]/10**20)/(CP[i+1][0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
)} 0,00 Token amount ETH amount Collateral details
Collateral amount Liquidation price Current Rate
{(this.state.CPamountETH / 10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {isNaN(this.state.CPamountTokenUSD/this.state.CPamountETH) ? (
0,00 USD
):(
{((this.state.CPamountTokenUSD / 10**2)/ (this.state.CPamountETH) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
)} 		{(this.props.rateUSD/10**2).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
{/* Start Mini Modal */} this.toggleModal("miniModal")} >

Remove collateral position {this.state.dataMiniModal[0]+1}

Tokens burn: {(this.state.dataMiniModal[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}

ETH receive: {(this.state.dataMiniModal[2]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}

{/* End Mini Modal */} {/* Start Form Modal */} this.toggleModal("formModal")} >

Transfer Collateral position { this.state.dataMiniModal[0]+1}

Tokens: {(this.state.dataMiniModal[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD
Collateral: {(this.state.dataMiniModal[2]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH
this.setState({ emailFocus: true })} onBlur={e => this.setState({ emailFocus: false })} />
{/* End Form Modal */}
); } } export default Vault;
